name: Christmas Anime Roblox✧.*
description:
𝐌𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐲 𝐂𝐡𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐚𝐬!
𝐆𝐞𝐭 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐦𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐦𝐚𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐦𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲!
𝐓𝐲𝐬𝐦 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐦𝐲 𝐬𝐭𝐲𝐥𝐞
𝑰𝒏𝒔𝒕𝒂~ @𝒉𝒐𝒑𝒆𝒊𝒔_𝒒𝒖𝒆𝒆𝒏
𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒕𝒖𝒃𝒆 @𝒂𝒏𝒈𝒆𝒍𝒙𝒔𝒘𝒆𝒆𝒕

user.name: Jhope's sister
user.about:
Hey I'm Angie(I'm new to making styles) and I upload many different styles 
You can request what style you would like me to make and I'll do my very best to make it. I'm also a Army and Blink, I stan other K-pop bands too!
Have a great day/night 
Bye!
